description: Comprehensive IT asset management SPA for creating, tracking, and managing IT equipment assignments.

contexts: AppContext: Main application data and business logic

pages_views.name: Dashboard
pages_views.description: Customizable, role-based overview with stats, pending approvals, and recent activity.

pages_views.name: Inventory
pages_views.description: Virtualized list of all equipment with advanced filtering, sorting, and bulk actions.

pages_views.name: Users
pages_views.description: Virtualized list of all users with filtering and bulk actions.

pages_views.name: Details Screens
pages_views.description: Detailed views for Equipment, Users, Models, and Categories.

pages_views.name: CRUD Forms
pages_views.description: Forms for creating/editing Equipment, Users, Models, Categories, and Locations.

pages_views.name: Assignment Wizard
pages_views.description: Multi-step guided process for assigning and returning equipment.

pages_views.name: Validation Screen
pages_views.description: Interface for the multi-step approval workflow (IT, Manager, User).

pages_views.name: Audit
pages_views.description: Feature for performing physical audits of equipment at a specific location using QR code scanning.

pages_views.name: Reports
pages_views.description: Generation and export of reports (CSV, PDF).

pages_views.name: Management
pages_views.description: Central hub for managing Categories, Models, and Locations.

backend.description: The application operates entirely on the client-side. All state and data are managed within the browser.

base_de_donnees.details: In-memory state managed by React Context, initialized from static data files. Uses localStorage for user preferences like theme and dashboard layout.

User.description: Represents an employee or administrator in the system.

Assignment.description: Links Equipment to a User for a specific action (assignment or return).

Model.description: A specific type of equipment (e.g., 'Dell Latitude 7420').

AuditLog & EditHistory.description: Tracks all significant actions and data modifications for accountability.

usages.description: Parses natural language queries (e.g., 'all macbooks in marketing') into structured JSON filters for data grids.
Uses the googleSearch tool to fetch equipment specifications from the web using a serial number, and to populate model details from a model name.

securite.role_based_access_control: Different UI and capabilities for Admin, Manager, and Employee roles.
authentication_methods: Biometric authentication via WebAuthn API for validation.

performance.virtualized_lists: Used in Inventory and Users pages to efficiently render large datasets.

data_handling.bulk_import: Admins can import Equipment, Users, and Models from CSV files with a validation step.
data_handling.export: Users can export various reports to CSV and PDF formats.
